meanings.definition: Relating to the process of laying eggs.
meanings.sent1: The ovipositional behavior of the bird was fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the ovipositional habits of the insects in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The ovipositional strategy of the hen involved finding the safest spot to lay her eggs.
meanings.sent4: Her ovipositional instincts were as precise as a clock, ensuring the survival of her offspring.
meanings.sent5: The ovipositional process in nature is a crucial step in the life cycle of many species.

meanings.sent1: The ovipositional of the fish was observed by the marine biologist.
meanings.sent2: The hen's ovipositional was a daily routine on the farm.
meanings.sent3: The ovipositional of the frog in the pond caused quite a stir among the tadpoles.
meanings.sent4: Her ovipositional in the nest was a delicate dance of care and precision.
meanings.sent5: The ovipositional of the butterfly was a graceful display of nature's beauty.
